results.title: Community Relations Director-Senior Living
results.description: Job Description We are currently looking for a Community Relations Director in the Boise Area for one of our locations. The individual will provide community relations and inside sales activities necessary to achieve and exceed the Community’s move-in goals to continuously maximize occupancy. This includes coordinating all sales plan events, maintaining public awareness, community networking including outreach and recognizing responsibility for budgetary guidelines.
